official_title: An Enhanced Vaginal Dilator Model to Improve Patient Adherence and Reduce Radiation-Induced Vaginal Stenosis: a Randomized Control Trial
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosis of endometrial or cervical cancer
* Undergoing external beam radiation therapy with or without brachytherapy
* English-speaking
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * History or current presence of fistula
